definition: bid or tender submission or delivery/bid or tender document

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: Where do we submit the tender?
Please read attached RFP for more details.
sentences.chinese: 请仔细阅读招标书附详情。

sentences.english: Alternatives may be submitted in addition to basic tender.
sentences.chinese: 在基本标书之外还可提出供选择的方案。

sentences.english: Photocopies of the Original Tender minimise the risk of discrepancies.
sentences.chinese: 标书正本影印件能最大限度地减少差异的几率。

sentences.english: C. Submit the bid and allow your brother to negotiate with the contracting office.
sentences.chinese: 发出招标书并让你的兄弟与合同部门谈判。

sentences.english: Please note that no remuneration will be made to bidders for preparation and submission of proposals.
sentences.chinese: 准备以及递交投标书的相关费用投标商自己承担。

sentences.english: Prices are indicated in details in the Schedule of Prices in Tender Form.
sentences.chinese: 价格应在投标书价格表中详细标明。

sentences.english: Here is our Submission of Tender.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们公司的投标书。

sentences.english: The supplier will take full responsibility and obligation for accomplishment of the Contract in accordance with the Bid Document.
sentences.chinese: 供货方对按照标书履行合同承担全部责任和义务。

sentences.english: However in exceptional circumstances, the Employer may request that the tenderers extend the period of validity for a specified additional period.
sentences.chinese: 然而，如有特殊情况，业主会要求延长标书的有效期。

sentences.english: This RFP lists the features of the required system.
sentences.chinese: 本招标书列出了所需系统的功能。

sentences.english: Please note that no remuneration will be made to bidders for preparation and submission of bids.
sentences.chinese: 准备以及递交投标书的相关费用投标商自己承担。

sentences.english: When signed and submitted, tender creates a legally binding and valid offer.
sentences.chinese: 签字并提交后，标书产生具有法律约束力的有效报价。

sentences.english: The cost of the private sector to prepare a bid for a government contract reduced by average 81%.
sentences.chinese: 私营部门编制政府合同标书的成本平均下降了81%。

sentences.english: Translated the bidding-material on Gui-xin highway project for a company.
sentences.chinese: 曾为一家公司翻译了贵新高速公路工程的标书。

definition: base number (of a tender)/starting price (for auction)
to report for judgment/to submit for approval
